overview: POOLS OF ANGER tells the modern story of war, inner-city gangs and drugs framed with the problems and solutions of teen runaways depression and suicide. Confronted at every turn by gangs and drug violence, Cody Ryan (Keith Allen) and his thirteen year-old streetwise pal (Nicholas Holmes) search for a beautiful runaway Amy (Jenny Shea) in the hostile inner city.
title: Pools of Anger
